title: Correct Hindi spelling: वैशेलिया to वैचेलिया

requirements.summary: Update all instances of 'वैशेलिया साइकोकेयर' to 'वैचेलिया साइकोकेयर' throughout the frontend
acceptanceCriteria: Header component displays 'वैचेलिया साइकोकेयर' in the logo text
HomePage hero section shows 'वैचेलिया साइकोकेयर' in the main heading
All translations in utils/translations.ts use 'वैचेलिया साइकोकेयर' instead of 'वैशेलिया साइकोकेयर'
No instances of the old spelling 'वैशेलिया' remain in the codebase

file_operations.description: Update the logo text from 'वैशेलिया साइकोकेयर' to 'वैचेलिया साइकोकेयर' in the Header component while preserving the English text 'Vachellia Psychocare' and all existing styling
Update the hero section heading from 'वैशेलिया साइकोकेयर' to 'वैचेलिया साइकोकेयर' while maintaining the same layout and styling
Replace all instances of 'वैशेलिया साइकोकेयर' with 'वैचेलिया साइकोकेयर' in the translations object, ensuring consistency across all Hindi text pairs
